name: Green Thumb & The Quest for a Green Universe
name_original: Green Thumb & The Quest for a Green Universe
description:
Follow GREEN THUMB and their trusty watering can on a spacial adventure that demonstrates the laws of space as they quest to rid the galaxy of any other color but GREEN.

CONTROLS :D

A - walk/turn left

D - walk/turn right

W/Space - jetpack thrust

S - GROW

Mouse - aim

Left mouse - shoot

Enemies drop red circles that give health and yellow plates that give POWER. Grow a tree on as many planets as you can!!!!?!

Credits

Space Captain Extraordinaire - Sumner Hensley - @Summy99

Rootoligist & Resident Secretary  - John Zuzock - @Fii 

(Made for Global Game Jam 2023, Theme: Roots)
